articles.title: 'American Idol': Watch King Charles, Camilla make surprise appearance - USA TODAY
articles.description: "American Idol" contestants just got a royal hello from Windsor Castle. Watch King Charles and Queen Consort Camilla's surprise appearance here.
articles.content:
"American Idol"contestants just got a royal, if sleepy, hello from Windsor Castle.

articles.title: 27 Dead In Gold Mine Fire Tragedy In Peru - NDTV
articles.description: At least 27 workers have died in a fire at a gold mine in a remote area of southern Peru, authorities said Sunday, making it one of the worst mining tragedies in the South American country's recent history.
articles.content:
At least 27 workers have died in a fire at a gold mine in southern Peru. (Representational)
Yanaquihua, Peru: At least 27 workers have died in a fire at a gold mine in a remote area of southern Peru… [+2796 chars]
